metadata.title: CVE-2024-26878 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: quota:Fix potential NULL pointer dereference Below race may cause NULL pointerdereference P1 P2 dquot_free_inode quota_off drop_dquot_refremove_dquot_ref dquots = i_dquot(inode) dquots = i_dquot(inode)srcu_read_lock dquots[cnt]) != NULL (1) dquots[type] = NULL (2)spin_lock(&dquots[cnt]->dq_dqb_lock) (3) .... If dquot_free_inode(or otherroutines) checks inode's quota pointers (1) before quota_off sets it toNULL(2) and use it (3) after that, NULL pointer dereference will betriggered. So let's fix it by using a temporary pointer to avoid thisissue.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
